text:
(d) incidents no longer subject to action.
AR 104. If the undertaking compiles the information described in AR 105, it shall consider the following:
(a) an incident is no longer subject to action if it is resolved, the case is completed, or no
further action is required by the undertaking. For example, an incident for which no
further action is required can include cases that are withdrawn or where the underlying
circumstances that led to the incident no longer exist;
